net.edudb.index.PartitionedHashTable

Interface EBPartitionedHashIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EBBucket, EBBucketList, EBDirectory, EBPartitionedHashTable

    public interface EBPartitionedHashIndex
    Author:
    Ahmed Abdul Badie

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIndex(EBIndex index)
      Adds a new index to the Partitioned Hash Table.
      void deleteIndex(EBIndex index)
      If more than a single index matches the required index, all of them will be deleted.
      java.util.ArrayList<EBIndex> getIndex(EBIndex index)
      Find the indexes that match the required index.
      void updateIndex(EBIndex oldIndex, EBIndex newIndex)
      If more than a single index matches the required index, all of them will be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • addIndex

        void addIndex(EBIndex index)
        Adds a new index to the Partitioned Hash Table.
        Parameters:
        index - Index to be added to Partitioned Hash Table. The index's values count must equal the count of the indexed keys

      • updateIndex

        void updateIndex(EBIndex oldIndex,
                 EBIndex newIndex)
        If more than a single index matches the required index, all of them will be updated.
        Parameters:
        oldIndex - Index to be updated
        newIndex - Index to replace the oldIndex

      • getIndex

        java.util.ArrayList<EBIndex> getIndex(EBIndex index)
        Find the indexes that match the required index. If more than a single index is found, all of them will be returned
        Parameters:
        index - Index to retrieve
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of matching indexes

      • deleteIndex

        void deleteIndex(EBIndex index)
        If more than a single index matches the required index, all of them will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        index - Index to delete.
